p: EV71-VP1 97R/L167G/E mixed viral population was pre-incubated with 300 μg/ml of soluble heparin sodium salt from porcine intestinal mucosa (H4784, Sigma-Aldrich, Merck, Switzerland) diluted in culture medium or with culture medium alone as control for 1 h at 37°C. Confluent monolayers of Vero, Caco-2, RD or SH-SY5Y cells were challenged with 50 μl of the pre-incubated virus-heparin or virus-alone mixture and virus binding and replication assays were performed.
